Projects
I'm using various technologies to create user-friendly, accessible and well-designed online solutions. Some of the work presented here was created on my journey to become a web developer and some was created for clients who trusted in me.
Experience
After graduating from University I started working as an IT-administrator and later as a GIS and database expert in a local civil engineering company. After spending more than 6 years there I've quit to become a developer which has always been my passion.
Code
I'm currently a student at Free Code Camp and Codecademy, where I sharpen my development skills while I'm looking for a new company to work for in this interesting field. Aktuell verbessere ich auch meiner Deutschkenntnisse.
